name: Mineshaft
description:
What is Mineshaft?

It is a sandbox game in which we can explore the mines, collect all kinds of items and fight mobs.

(The game has a multiplayer mode for 2 players on one screen which is not polished.)

It is in the current version:

  • 5 items
  • 1 enemy
  • 13 different rooms
  • 4 biomes

Social Media:
YouTube Channel
Twitter
Discord (Mineshaft)

Player 1 Controls 

A and D - Movement
Space - Jumping
E - Interacting with objects
Q - Dropping items
F - Using items
1-5 - Item slots

Player 2 Controls

J and L - MovementI - Jumping
O - Interacting with objectsU - Dropping items
P - Using items
6-0 - Item slots

Minimal required

  • OS: Windows 7/8/10, Ubuntu 20.04.2.0 or above
  • Processor: Intel i3-4150 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 820m or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: This is not required
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
